metadata.description: Specifies the value of the secret that you want to create.
Required. Name of the Log Analytics workspace.
Optional. Location for all resources.
Optional. Service Tier: PerGB2018, Free, Standalone, PerGB or PerNode.
Optional. List of storage accounts to be read by the workspace.
Optional. List of services to be linked.
Conditional. List of Storage Accounts to be linked. Required if 'forceCmkForQuery' is set to 'true' and 'savedSearches' is not empty.
Optional. Kusto Query Language searches to save.
Optional. LAW data sources to configure.
Optional. Number of days data will be retained for.
Optional. The workspace daily quota for ingestion.
Optional. The network access type for accessing Log Analytics ingestion.
Optional. The network access type for accessing Log Analytics query.
Optional. Set to 'true' to use resource or workspace permissions and 'false' (or leave empty) to require workspace permissions.
Optional. Specifies the number of days that logs will be kept for; a value of 0 will retain data indefinitely.
Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic storage account.
Optional. Resource ID of a log analytics workspace.
Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic event hub authorization rule for the Event Hubs namespace in which the event hub should be created or streamed to.
Optional. Name of the diagnostic event hub within the namespace to which logs are streamed. Without this, an event hub is created for each log category.
Optional. Indicates whether customer managed storage is mandatory for query management.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).
Optional. The name of logs that will be streamed. "allLogs" includes all possible logs for the resource.
Optional. The name of metrics that will be streamed.
Optional. The name of the diagnostic setting, if deployed.

properties.notes: [if(equals(parameters('lock'), 'CanNotDelete'), 'Cannot delete resource or child resources.', 'Cannot modify the resource or child resources.')]

metadata.description: Conditional. The name of the parent Log Analytics workspace. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Optional. The name of the storage insights config.
Required. The Azure Resource Manager ID of the storage account resource.
Optional. The names of the blob containers that the workspace should read.
Optional. The names of the Azure tables that the workspace should read.
Optional. Tags to configure in the resource.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).
The resource ID of the deployed storage insights configuration.
The resource group where the storage insight configuration is deployed.
The name of the storage insights configuration.
Conditional. The name of the parent Log Analytics workspace. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Required. Name of the link.
Required. The resource ID of the resource that will be linked to the workspace. This should be used for linking resources which require read access.
Optional. The resource ID of the resource that will be linked to the workspace. This should be used for linking resources which require write access.
Optional. Tags to configure in the resource.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).
The name of the deployed linked service.
The resource ID of the deployed linked service.
The resource group where the linked service is deployed.
Conditional. The name of the parent Log Analytics workspace. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Required. Name of the link.
Required. The resource ID of the resource that will be linked to the workspace. This should be used for linking resources which require read access.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).
The name of the deployed linked storage account.
The resource ID of the deployed linked storage account.
The resource group where the linked storage account is deployed.
Conditional. The name of the parent Log Analytics workspace. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Required. Name of the saved search.
Required. Display name for the search.
Required. Query category.
Required. Kusto Query to be stored.
Optional. Tags to configure in the resource.
Optional. The function alias if query serves as a function.

Optional. The optional function parameters if query serves as a function. Value should be in the following format: "param-name1:type1 = default_value1, param-name2:type2 = default_value2". For more examples and proper syntax please refer to /azure/kusto/query/functions/user-defined-functions.
Optional. The version number of the query language.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).
The resource ID of the deployed saved search.
The resource group where the saved search is deployed.
The name of the deployed saved search.
Conditional. The name of the parent Log Analytics workspace. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Required. Name of the solution.
Required. The kind of the DataSource.
Optional. Tags to configure in the resource.
Optional. Resource ID of the resource to be linked.
Optional. Windows event log name to configure when kind is WindowsEvent.
Optional. Windows event types to configure when kind is WindowsEvent.
Optional. Name of the object to configure when kind is WindowsPerformanceCounter or LinuxPerformanceObject.
Optional. Name of the instance to configure when kind is WindowsPerformanceCounter or LinuxPerformanceObject.
Optional. Interval in seconds to configure when kind is WindowsPerformanceCounter or LinuxPerformanceObject.
Optional. List of counters to configure when the kind is LinuxPerformanceObject.
Optional. Counter name to configure when kind is WindowsPerformanceCounter.
Optional. State to configure when kind is IISLogs or LinuxSyslogCollection or LinuxPerformanceCollection.
Optional. System log to configure when kind is LinuxSyslog.
Optional. Severities to configure when kind is LinuxSyslog.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).
The resource ID of the deployed data source.
The resource group where the data source is deployed.
The name of the deployed data source.
Required. The IDs of the principals to assign the role to.
Required. The name of the role to assign. If it cannot be found you can specify the role definition ID instead.
Required. The resource ID of the resource to apply the role assignment to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container".
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
The resource ID of the deployed log analytics workspace.
The resource group of the deployed log analytics workspace.
The name of the deployed log analytics workspace.
The ID associated with the workspace.
The location the resource was deployed into.
ResourceID for LAW operations
Required. The name of the action group.
Required. The short name of the action group.
Optional. Indicates whether this action group is enabled. If an action group is not enabled, then none of its receivers will receive communications.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Optional. The list of email receivers that are part of this action group.
Optional. The list of SMS receivers that are part of this action group.
Optional. The list of webhook receivers that are part of this action group.
Optional. The list of ITSM receivers that are part of this action group.
Optional. The list of AzureAppPush receivers that are part of this action group.
Optional. The list of AutomationRunbook receivers that are part of this action group.
Optional. The list of voice receivers that are part of this action group.
Optional. The list of logic app receivers that are part of this action group.
Optional. The list of function receivers that are part of this action group.
Optional. The list of ARM role receivers that are part of this action group. Roles are Azure RBAC roles and only built-in roles are supported.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).
Optional. Location for all resources.
Required. The IDs of the principals to assign the role to.
Required. The name of the role to assign. If it cannot be found you can specify the role definition ID instead.
Required. The resource ID of the resource to apply the role assignment to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container".
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
The resource group the action group was deployed into.
The name of the action group .
The resource ID of the action group .
The location the resource was deployed into.

resources.name: [format('{0}-{1}-sqlmetricmemory', uniqueString(deployment().name, parameters('ukslocation')), parameters('env'))]

value: [reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, parameters('rg_sqlserver')), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('{0}-{1}-iagcom', uniqueString(deployment().name, parameters('ukslocation')), parameters('env'))), '2022-09-01').outputs.resourceId.value]

metadata.description: Required. The name of the alert.
Optional. Description of the alert.
Optional. Location for all resources.
Optional. Indicates whether this alert is enabled.
Optional. The severity of the alert.
Optional. how often the metric alert is evaluated represented in ISO 8601 duration format.
Optional. the period of time (in ISO 8601 duration format) that is used to monitor alert activity based on the threshold.
Optional. the list of resource IDs that this metric alert is scoped to.
Conditional. The resource type of the target resource(s) on which the alert is created/updated. Required if alertCriteriaType is MultipleResourceMultipleMetricCriteria.
Conditional. The region of the target resource(s) on which the alert is created/updated. Required if alertCriteriaType is MultipleResourceMultipleMetricCriteria.
Optional. The flag that indicates whether the alert should be auto resolved or not.
Optional. The list of actions to take when alert triggers.
Optional. Maps to the 'odata.type' field. Specifies the type of the alert criteria.
Required. Criterias to trigger the alert. Array of 'Microsoft.Azure.Monitor.SingleResourceMultipleMetricCriteria' or 'Microsoft.Azure.Monitor.MultipleResourceMultipleMetricCriteria' objects.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).
Required. The IDs of the principals to assign the role to.
Required. The name of the role to assign. If it cannot be found you can specify the role definition ID instead.
Required. The resource ID of the resource to apply the role assignment to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container".
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
The resource group the metric alert was deployed into.
The name of the metric alert.
The resource ID of the metric alert.
The location the resource was deployed into.
